content:
SubscribeServiceCallback<TServiceType> Delegate

Definition

Represents a generic delegate that is a callback for service subscriptions.

In this Article

public delegate void SubscribeServiceCallback<TServiceType>(TServiceType serviceInstance);

Type Parameters

TServiceType

The type of the service to subscribe to.
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
SubscribeServiceCallback<TServiceType>
